1: {= value1 }
2: {= floatVal }
{if boolVal == TRUE}
2: Boolean is true
{/if}
3: Some Line of Code
{if value1 == "Some value"}
4: Some skippedText
{/if}
5: Some other text
{if boolVal}
6: Boolean is true
{/if}
{if !falseVal}
6: falseVal is false
{/if}
7: Yet another text
{if value1}
8: Some not empty string
{/if}
{if emptyVal}
8: Some empty string
{/if}
9: Last text
